Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 114th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1966...
Released by St. Louis on 8/14/1966...
Drafted in 2nd round, 25th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1967...
Injured on 4/8/1968 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Pittsburgh on 4/15/1968 (Going to CHC: P T. Butters. Going to PIT: P J. Cram)...
Injured on 8/3/1971 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
